title: Ganking Mid Heores
body:
I am new league or legends and am currently a DOTA player (+800 hours) who would like to try something new and fresh* I want to know some champions that are strong mid lane heroes that increase their ADC (preferably ADC) or APC power through ganking; as I play DOTA heroes like Legion Commander, Shadow Fiend, Luna, Juggernaut and Outworld Devourer playing a very gank heavy early and mid game role or strat to scale into a late game powerhouse. Any champ recommendations and how I should build them are appreciated.

Dont hate just because I play DOTA plz ;)

Cheers,
Syphilitic GIbon


*giving LoL a try as a mate of mine is playing dota with me I agreed to playing League with him

replies.body:
Some of the best mid lane roamers are Ahri, Lissandra and Zed

All have strong mobility, waveclear and burst. Allowing you to push lanes quickly and roam immediately after so you don't lose a turret for a roam. Super quick and basic builds for the three are:

Ahri: 
Skill Order R-Q-W-E
Morellonomicon-Sorcerer's Shoes-Rabaddon's Deathcap-Void Staff-Zhonya's Hourglass-Luden's Echo or Guardian Angel or Abyssal Scepter

Lissandra:
Skill Order R-Q-W-E
Morellonomicon-Sorcerer's Shoes (Or Ionian Boots of Lucidity)-Zhonya's Hourglass-Rabaddon's Deathcap-Void Staff-Abyssal Scepter/Luden's Echo

Zed:
Skill Order R-Q-E-W
Blade of the Ruined King-Youmuu's Ghostblade-Boots are very situational, assess the situation-Last Whisper. From here, If ahead Bloodthirster-Infinity Edge. If going even Black Cleaver-Guardian Angel. If behind Ravenous Hydra-Guardian Angel and just splitpush.
